entry.title: Deep Tissue Therapy Massage Gun
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wireless Xplosion Ltd
Type: Massage Gun
Price: 29.99

  • Ergonomic handheld design, easy operation, lightweight and portable, let you enjoy deep muscle massage anytime anywhere.
  • Equipped with massage head for precise massage to give your body all-round care
  • Relieve various discomforts like fatigue, relieve soreness, make your fitness effect more significant 
  • Suitable for all kinds of people 
  • Small size but powerful 4-speed mode to awaken muscle vitality 
  • Specifications :
    Product Dimension : 95*145*43mm
    Rotating Speed : 2400-3200rpm
    Charging Time : 3 hrs
    Working time : 6 hrs
    Battery Capacity : 1800mAh Max
    Noise : 50dB
    Rated Input : 5V,2A

entry.title: Turbo UV Light Sterilizer Box + Fast Wireless Charger

Vendor: Rockstone

  • Sterilize your phone, earphones, ear pods, face masks, keys, watches and much more within the tolerance range of size.
  • Sterilizer function works while you are charging the phone
